Title: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE ABOLITION OF THE CEDULA TAX.
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 238, November 15, 1937 ]
AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE ABOLITION OF THE CEDULA TAX.
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. The cedula tax is abolished, and all delinquencies by reason thereof are condoned.(aw√ûhi(
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, November 15, 1937.
